name: Orbtangle
description:
Orbtangle is a simplistic puzzle game which requires you to swap the positions of orbs in order to untangle the lines with which they are connected. Only once none of the lines are crossing each other the level is completed.
The game provides an endless mode in three difficulties and three additional campaigns with over 100 additional levels to unlock. The colors of the game elements are fully customizable and can be set to your liking!
